item.text: After getting into a boat he crossed to the other side and came to his own town.

<st data-num="2400">Just then</st><n id="1" /> some people<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4374" class="">brought</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="3885" class="">paralytic</st> <st data-num="906" class="">lying</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="2825" class="">stretcher</st>.<n id="3" /> When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3885" class="">paralytic</st>, “Have <st data-num="2293" class="">courage</st>, <st data-num="5043" class="">son</st>! <st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> are <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st>.”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This man</st> is <st data-num="987" class="">blaspheming</st>!”<n id="3" />

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1492">perceived</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1761">thoughts</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="2444">Why</st> do you <st data-num="1760" class="">respond</st> with <st data-num="4190">evil</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>?

<st data-num="5101" class="">Which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2123" class="">easier</st>,<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="4771">Your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> are <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven’</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> to <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1453">Stand up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walk’</st>?

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> to <st data-num="863" class="">forgive</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>”—<st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3885" class="">paralytic</st><n id="3" />—“<st data-num="1453">Stand up</st>, <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2825" class="">stretcher</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">home</st>.”<n id="4" />
<st data-num="2532">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1453">stood up</st> and <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">home</st>.<n id="2" />
When the crowd saw this, they were afraid and honored God who had given such authority to men.
As Jesus went on from there, he saw a man named Matthew sitting at the tax booth. “Follow me,” he said to him. So he got up and followed him.

As<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="345">having a meal</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> Matthew’s<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="5057" class="">tax collectors</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="4873" class="">ate</st> with <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>.

When <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> this they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, “<st data-num="1501">Why</st> does <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="1320" class="">teacher</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5057">tax collectors</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>?”<n id="2" />

When<n id="1" /> Jesus <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="3588">Those who</st> are <st data-num="2480" class="">healthy</st> don’t <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> a <st data-num="2395" class="">physician</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3588">those who</st> <st data-num="2192">are</st> <st data-num="2560" class="">sick</st> do.<n id="2" />
Go and learn what this saying means: ‘I want mercy and not sacrifice.’ For I did not come to call the righteous, but sinners.”
Then John’s disciples came to Jesus and asked, “Why do we and the Pharisees fast often, but your disciples don’t fast?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3588" class="">The</st> <st data-num="3567">wedding</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">guests</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3361 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="3996" class="">mourn</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">while</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, can they? <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st><n id="3" /> are <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st> will be <st data-num="522" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> they will <st data-num="3522" class="">fast</st>.

<st data-num="3762">No one</st> <st data-num="1911" class="">sews</st> a <st data-num="4138" class="">patch</st> of <st data-num="46" class="">unshrunk</st> <st data-num="4470" class="">cloth</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> an <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">garment</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="4138" class="">patch</st> will <st data-num="142">pull away</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">garment</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4978" class="">tear</st> will <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5501" class="">worse</st>.<n id="1" />
And no one pours new wine into old wineskins; otherwise the skins burst and the wine is spilled out and the skins are destroyed. Instead they put new wine into new wineskins and both are preserved.”
As he was saying these things, a leader came, bowed low before him, and said, “My daughter has just died, but come and lay your hand on her and she will live.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="1453">got up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> who had been <st data-num="131">suffering from a hemorrhage</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="1427" class="">12</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came up</st> <st data-num="3693" class="">behind</st> him and <st data-num="680" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2899" class="">edge</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloak</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> she kept <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">herself</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1437">If</st> <st data-num="3440" class="">only</st> I <st data-num="680" class="">touch</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloak</st>, I will be <st data-num="4982" class="">healed</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4762" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2293">Have courage</st>, <st data-num="2364" class="">daughter</st>! <st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> has made <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4982" class="">well</st>.”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> was <st data-num="4982" class="">healed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st>.

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="758">leader’s</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="834">flute players</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2350" class="">disorderly</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>,

he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="402">Go away</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2877" class="">girl</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2518" class="">asleep</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they began <st data-num="2606">making fun</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> had been <st data-num="1544">forced outside</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1525" class="">went in</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2902">gently took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> by the <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2877" class="">girl</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">got up</st>.
And the news of this spread throughout that region.
As Jesus went on from there, two blind men began to follow him, shouting, “Have mercy on us, Son of David!”

When<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind men</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Do you <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I am <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>?” They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3483">Yes</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.”

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="680" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “Let it be <st data-num="1096" class="">done</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> were <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1690" class="">sternly warned</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3708">See that</st> <st data-num="3367">no one</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">knows</st> about this!”
But they went out and spread the news about him throughout that entire region.
As they were going away, a man who was demon-possessed and unable to speak was brought to him.

After <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demon</st> was <st data-num="1544" class="">cast out</st>, <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> man who had been <st data-num="2974" class="">mute</st> began to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">The</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> were <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3763" class="">Never</st> has anything <st data-num="3779">like this</st> been <st data-num="5316" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>!”
But the Pharisees said, “By the ruler of demons he casts out demons!”
Then Jesus went throughout all the towns and villages, teaching in their synagogues, preaching the good news of the kingdom, and healing every kind of disease and sickness.

When<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st>, he had <st data-num="4697" class="">compassion</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4660" class="">bewildered</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4496" class="">helpless</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5616" class="">like</st> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">without</st> a <st data-num="4166" class="">shepherd</st>.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, “<st data-num="3588">The</st> <st data-num="2326" class="">harvest</st> is <st data-num="4183" class="">plentiful</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2040" class="">workers</st> are <st data-num="3641">few</st>.
Therefore ask the Lord of the harvest to send out workers into his harvest-ready fields.”
